```{r}
r2_general <-function(preds,actual){ 
  return(1- sum((preds - actual) ^ 2)/sum((actual - mean(actual))^2))
}

RMSE_func <- function(preds, actual){
  return(sqrt(mean((actual - preds)^2)))
}

'%!in%' <- function(x,y)!('%in%'(x,y))

.cleanNames <- function(xx){
  
  xx <- gsub('-','',xx)
  xx <- gsub('_','',xx)
  xx <- gsub(' ','',xx)
  xx <- gsub("'",'',xx)
  
  xx
}

conditionalComparison <- function( output, newdata ){
  
  # compare conditional prediction with unconditional prediction in output
  
  ydataCond <- newdata$ydataCond
  colnames(ydataCond) <- .cleanNames( colnames(ydataCond) )
  
  y           <- as.matrix( output$inputs$y )
  colnames(y) <- .cleanNames( colnames(y) )
  
  typeNames <- output$modelList$typeNames
  zeroCols  <- which(typeNames %in% c('DA','CA','OC','CC'))
  
  x         <- output$inputs$xUnstand
  S         <- ncol(y)
  n         <- nrow(x)
  if( is.null(ydataCond) )stop(' newdata must include ydataCond ' )
  if( is.null(colnames(ydataCond)) )stop( 'ydataCond must have colnames matching ydata' )
  
  y0 <- y
  y0[ y0 > 0 ] <- 1
  percZero <- signif(1 - apply(y0, 2, sum)/nrow(y0),3)*100
  
  ni <- match(colnames(ydataCond), colnames(y))   # condition on these columns
  ci <- c(1:S)[-ni]
  if( length(ni) < ncol(ydataCond) )stop( 'ydataCond must have colnames matching ydata' )
  
  edata <- output$inputs$effMat
  if( is.null(edata) )edata <- newdata$effort$values
  if( is.null(edata) )edata <- y*0 + 1
  wUn <- output$prediction$ypredMu/edata
  w   <- y/edata
  
  preds  <- gjamPredict(output, newdata = newdata, FULL=T) 
  condy  <- preds$sdList$yMu                                # on data scale
  condw  <- condy/edata                                     # latent scale
  
  coni <- (w[,ci] - condw[,ci] )^2
  unci <- ( w[,ci] - wUn[,ci] )^2
  umc  <- unci - coni
  uno  <- length(which(umc > 0))/length(umc)  # fraction larger error in uncon
  
  uno <- umc
  uno[ uno > 0 ] <- 1
  uno[ uno <= 0 ] <- 0
  
  
  if( length(ci) == 1 ){
    con <- mean( coni  )
    unc <- mean( unci )
    uno <- sum(uno)/length(uno)
  }else{ 
    con <- diag( var( w[,ci] - condw[,ci] ) )
    unc <- diag( var( w[,ci] - wUn[,ci] ) )
    uno <- apply(uno, 2, sum)/nrow(umc)
  }
  
  wi <- which(typeNames[ci] == 'PA')
  if( length(wi) > 0){
    tt <- .binaryScore(condw[,ci[wi]], y[,ci[wi]])
    con <- tt$brierScore
    #  ccLog   <- tt$logScore
    
    tt <- .binaryScore(wUn[,ci[wi]], y[,ci[wi]])
    unc <- tt$brierScore
    #  uuLog   <- tt$logScore
  }
  
  
  sigma <- output$parameters$sigMu
  beta  <- output$parameters$betaMu
  
  C  <- solve(sigma[ni,ni])%*%sigma[ni,ci]      # check for correlation matrix
  mu <- x%*%beta
  
  if(length(zeroCols) > 0){
    mz <- mu[,zeroCols]
    mz[ mz < 0 ] <- 0
    mu[,zeroCols] <- mz
  }
  Rs <- w[,ci,drop=F] - mu[,ci,drop=F]
  Rn <- w[,ni,drop=F] - mu[,ni,drop=F]
  D  <- Rn%*%C
  # z  <- -(2*t(Rs) + t(D))%*%D
  
  z <- ( 2*t(Rs) - t(C)%*%t(Rn) )%*%Rn%*%C
  colnames(z) <- rownames(z)
  
  vmu <- var(mu[,ci])
  vd  <- var(D)
  cf  <- vd/(vmu + vd)      #variance fraction from conditional
  
  fe <- output$fit$fractionExplained
  ynames <- colnames(fe)
  ynames <- ynames[ ynames %in% colnames(condy)[ci] ]
  ynames <- ynames[ !ynames == 'other' ]
  
  if( length(wi) == 0 ){   # not PA data
    
    if( length(ci) == 1 ){
      
      imat <- cbind( unc, con, 
                     (unc - con)/unc*100, uno,
                     fe[1,ynames], diag(cf), diag(z)[ynames]/n )
    }else{
      imat <- cbind( unc[ynames], con[ynames], 
                     (unc - con)[ynames]/unc[ynames]*100, uno[ynames],
                     fe[1,ynames], diag(cf)[ynames], diag(z)[ynames]/n )
    }
    colnames(imat) <- c("Unc MSPE", "Con MSPE", "Perc Diff", "Frac u > c",
                        "Frac Expl", 
                        "Frac Con", "CIS")
  }else{  # PA data
    
    if( length(ci) == 1 ){
      
      imat <- cbind( unc, con, 
                     (unc - con)/unc*100, uno,
                     fe[1,ynames], diag(cf) )
    }else{
      imat <- cbind( unc[ynames], con[ynames], (unc - con)[ynames]/unc[ynames]*100, 
                     uno[ynames],
                     fe[1,ynames], diag(cf)[ynames] )
    }
    colnames(imat) <- c("Unc Brier", "Con Brier", "Perc Diff", "Frac u > c",
                        "Frac Expl", 
                        "Frac Con")
  }
  if(typeNames[1] != 'CON'){
    percZero <- percZero[ynames]
    imat <- cbind(imat, percZero)
  }
  if( nrow(imat) == 1)rownames(imat) <- colnames(y)[ci]
  out1 <- list(imat, C)
  out1
}


```

# CPUE (counts per unit effort)

# 1 out of sample 
train on 70% and test on 30% 

## 1.1 Fit model
If you don't want to re-fit the model, the output is already saved and can be loaded in the next chunk.
```{r}

#read data 
ytest <- read.csv("X:/conditionalPrediction/DATA/fish/ytest.csv")
xtest <- read.csv("X:/conditionalPrediction/DATA/fish/xtest.csv")
ytrain <- read.csv("X:/conditionalPrediction/DATA/fish/ytrain.csv")
xtrain <- read.csv("X:/conditionalPrediction/DATA/fish/xtrain.csv")

ydata <- rbind(ytrain, ytest)
ydata <- sqrt(ydata)
xdata <- rbind(xtrain, xtest)

ynames <- colnames(ydata)
xnames <- colnames(xdata)


total <- cbind(ydata, xdata)
total <- total %>% dplyr::filter(SUBREGION2 == "GulfofMaine")

ydata <- total[,colnames(total) %in% ynames]
xdata <- total[,colnames(total) %in% xnames]
ydata <- ydata[,colSums(ydata != 0) > 150] # species with more than 150 observations

ynames <- colnames(ydata)
xnames <- colnames(xdata)

smp_size <- floor(0.70 * nrow(total))
set.seed(123)
train_ind <- sample(seq_len(nrow(total)), size = smp_size)
train <- total[train_ind, ]
test <- total[-train_ind, ]

ytrain <- train[,colnames(train) %in% ynames]
xtrain <- train[,colnames(train) %in% xnames]
ytest <- test [,colnames(test ) %in% ynames]
xtest <- test [,colnames(test) %in% xnames]

#run gjam

ml <- list(ng = 20000, burnin = 8000, typeNames = 'CA')
out <- gjam(~BT + depth + BSAL + SST + chla + SEDSIZE + month, xdata = xtrain, ydata = ytrain, modelList = ml) 

save(out, file='X:/conditionalPrediction/OUT/fish-out_train_CPUE_fall.rdata')

```


## 1.2 Conditional prediction
Conditional predict test data. Each species is conditioned on all other species
```{r}
load('X:/conditionalPrediction/OUT/fish-out_train_CPUE_fall.Rdata') #in case you don't want to run the full thing
ytest <- read.csv("X:/conditionalPrediction/DATA/fish/ytest.csv")
xtest <- read.csv("X:/conditionalPrediction/DATA/fish/xtest.csv")

# only keep species that were fitted in the model
ytest <- ytest[,which(colnames(ytest) %in% colnames(out$inputs$y))]

#conditionally predict
#holdout
row_names <- rownames(ytest)
col_names <- colnames(ytest)
pred_con <- matrix(nrow = nrow(ytest), ncol = ncol(ytest), dimnames = list(row_names, col_names))

pb <- txtProgressBar(0, ncol(ytest), style = 3)

for(p in 1:ncol(ytest)){
  pdex <- colnames(ytest)[p]
  
  #ydataCond <- select(ytest, !all_of(pdex))
  
  newdata <- list(xdata = xtest, ydataCond = ytest[,-p], nsim = 300) # conditionally predict out-of-sample

  p6      <- gjamPredict(out, newdata = newdata)
  pred_con[,pdex] <- p6$sdList$yMu[,p]
  
  setTxtProgressBar(pb, p)
  Sys.sleep(time = 1)
}

```

```{r}
total_strat <- total_strat %>% group_by(season, spp, year, stratum, stratumarea, pred_typ) %>% summarise(biomass = mean(biomass)) %>% mutate(biomass_area = biomass*stratumarea)

total_strat <- total_strat %>% mutate(pred_type = factor(pred_typ)) %>% mutate(pred_type = fct_relevel(pred_type, c("observed", "unconditional", "conditional")))

#plotit 
strat <- sf::st_read("stratum/BTS_strata.shp")
#plot(strat)


strat <- left_join(strat, total_strat, by = c("STRATA" = "stratum"))
st_crs(strat) = 4326 #this is WGS 1984


# plot
library(rnaturalearth)
world <- ne_countries(scale = "medium", returnclass = "sf")
cols <- c("blue3", 
          "purple",
          "orange", "brown")
p <- ggplot() + geom_sf(data = world) + 
  geom_sf(data = subset(strat, strat$spp == "ATLANTIC.COD" & strat$year == 2016), aes(group = as.factor(biomass_area), fill = biomass_area))+ 
  coord_sf(xlim=c(-74, -65), ylim=c(40,46), expand = TRUE) + scale_fill_gradientn(colours = cols,
                        values = c(0, 0.1, 0.35, 0.75, 1)) + facet_wrap(~ pred_type) + theme_Publication() + theme(legend.position = "right", legend.direction = "vertical") +labs(fill = "Atlantic cod\nbiomass per stratum\n(kg/km2)")+
  theme_bw() +
  theme(panel.grid = element_blank(),
        strip.background = element_blank(),
        strip.text = element_text(hjust = 0),
        axis.title = element_blank(),
        panel.spacing.x = unit(6, "mm")) 

ggsave("codmaps_1.jpg", plot=p, width = 25, height=10, units=c("cm"), dpi=500)

#difference maps 
strat_sub <- strat %>% dplyr::select(-pred_typ, -biomass) %>% pivot_wider(names_from = "pred_type", values_from = biomass_area) %>% mutate(sub_con = conditional - observed, sub_uncon = unconditional - observed) %>% pivot_longer(cols = c("sub_uncon", "sub_con", "observed"))

strat_sub <- st_as_sf(strat_sub)
strat_sub <- strat_sub %>% filter(name %in% c("sub_uncon", "sub_con", "observed"))
st_crs(strat_sub) = 4326
strat_sub$name1 <- as.factor(strat_sub$name)

cols <- c("blue3", 
          "purple", "white",
          "orange", "brown")

label_names <- as_labeller(c("sub_uncon" = "unconditional - observed", "sub_con" = "conditional - observed", "observed" = "observed"))

p <- ggplot() + geom_sf(data = world) + 
  geom_sf(data = subset(strat_sub, strat_sub$spp == "ATLANTIC.COD" & strat_sub$year == 2012), aes(group = as.factor(value), fill = value))+ 
  coord_sf(xlim=c(-74, -65), ylim=c(40,46), expand = TRUE) + facet_wrap(~ name1, labeller = label_names) + theme_Publication() + theme(legend.position = "right", legend.direction = "vertical") +labs(fill = "Atlantic cod\nbiomass per stratum\n(kg/km2)")+
  theme_bw() +
  theme(panel.grid = element_blank(),
        strip.background = element_blank(),
        strip.text = element_text(hjust = 0),
        axis.title = element_blank(),
        panel.spacing.x = unit(6, "mm")) + scale_fill_gradient2(low = "blue3", high = "brown", mid = "white", midpoint = 1, breaks = c(-500,0,1000,2000))

p
```
